sentences.en: ‘You naughty girl!’ Mom said, wagging her finger at me.
sentences.cn: “你这个调皮的丫头！”妈妈对我摇了摇手指说道。

sentences.en: At hearing his name spoken, the dog gave a responsive wag of his tail.
sentences.cn: 听到有人喊它的名字，这条狗摆了摆尾巴。

sentences.en: Dogs wag their tails when they are pleased.
Don't just wag your chin. Stop talking and get to work.
sentences.cn: 不要光闲谈. 停止讲话,开始工作.

sentences.en: He is a bit of a wag.
He's a bit of a wag, his dad.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸这个人说话相当风趣。

sentences.en: He's a bit of a wag.
I yelled to him and thought I saw his tail wag.
sentences.cn: 我大喊着它,我看见它的尾巴在摇动.

sentences.en: I yelled to him and thought I saw his wag.
sentences.cn: 我朝它叫喊,好像看见它摇了摇尾巴.

sentences.en: I'll not wag an ace further.
It is an ill horse can neither whinny nor wag his tail.
sentences.cn: 再笨的马也会嘶鸣或摆尾.

sentences.en: It'should be noted that the vibration is not wig - wag.
sentences.cn: 要注意,这里讲的振动不是摇摆.

sentences.en: The dog greeted its master with a wag of its tail.
The dog was biting, growling and wagging its tail.
sentences.cn: 那条狗咬着叫着，还摇着尾巴。

sentences.en: The tail is too big to wag.
Their secret meetings set the villagers to wag their tongues.
sentences.cn: 他们秘密相会,使村民们议论纷纷.

sentences.en: WAG is a widely used method, its devise principle, scheme and shortage are introduced.
sentences.cn: 针对广泛使用的水气交替注入(WAG)法, 介绍了设计原则 、 注入方案及存在的不足.

words.tran_cn: 摆动；喋喋不休；蹒跚而行

trans.tran_cn: 摇动，摆动，爱说笑的人，滑稽角色，<英俚>逃学，偷懒
trans.tran_en: someone who says or does something clever and amusing
if a dog wags its tail, or if its tail wags, the dog moves its tail many times from one side to the other

trans.tran_cn: 摆动，喋喋不休，蹒跚而行

trans.tran_en: if a dog wags its tail, or if its tail wags, the dog moves its tail many times from one side to the other

trans.tran_cn: 摇动，摇摆，饶舌，（时势等）推移，变迁
